title: Schönbrunn Palace
description: Historic Baroque palace with vast gardens and the oldest zoo in the world.

title: Stephansdom
description: The Gothic cathedral is one of Vienna's most iconic buildings.

title: Prater & Riesenrad
description: A large public park with the famous giant Ferris wheel.

title: Kunsthistorisches Museum
description: One of the premier fine arts museums in Europe.

title: Naschmarkt
description: Popular market with local and international food stands.

title: Belvedere Palace
description: Baroque palace complex with art museum featuring Klimt’s ‘The Kiss’.

title: Albertina
description: Museum known for its graphic art and modern exhibitions.

title: Hundertwasserhaus
description: Colorful expressionist landmark by artist Friedensreich Hundertwasser.
